# PageRelations Application relations.description=La [[extensión Relaciones>>https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Page%20Relations%20Application/]] le permite relacionar páginas entre sí, tanto dentro de un mismo wiki como a través de varios wikis.
# Class fields XWiki.Relations.IsRelatedToClass_page=Página
# Live table generic keys relations.livetable.doc.title=Título de página relations.livetable.doc.name=Nombre de página relations.livetable.doc.space=Espacio relations.livetable.doc.fullname=Nombre completo de página relations.livetable.doc.location=Ubicación relations.livetable.doc.author=Último autor relations.livetable.doc.creator=Creador relations.livetable.doc.date=Fecha relations.livetable.doc.creationDate=Fecha de creación relations.livetable._avatar=Avatar relations.livetable._images=Imágenes relations.livetable._attachments=Adjuntos relations.livetable._actions=Acciones relations.livetable._actions.edit=Editar relations.livetable._actions.delete=Eliminar relations.livetable.emptyvalue=—
# Live table specific keys relations.livetable.page=Página
# RelationListMacro relations.entry.name=Relaciones relations.title=Relaciones relations.error=Se produjo un error: relations.notAllowed=No tiene permitido efectuar esta acción. relations.facets=Facetas: relations.add.relatedPage=Página relacionada: relations.add.label=Añadir relación ### Missing: relations.add.hint=Add relation from this page to another one ### Missing: relations.add.selectPage=Select a page ### Missing: relations.add.submit=Add ### Missing: relations.add.cancel=Cancel ### Missing: relations.add.gettingForm=Preparing relation addition form... ### Missing: relations.add.processing=Creating the relation... ### Missing: relations.add.error.alreadySet=This relations was already set. ### Missing: relations.add.history.message=Addition of a relation to "{0}" ### Missing: relations.remove.processing=Removing relation... ### Missing: relations.remove.done=Relation removed ### Missing: relations.remove.hint=Remove relation ### Missing: relations.remove.error.notFound=The target page was not found. ### Missing: relations.remove.error.failed=An error occurred. ### Missing: relations.remove.history.message=Removal of a relation with "{0}" ### Missing: relations.update.page=Update relation to "{0}" ### Missing: relations.panel.title=Relations ### Missing: relations.remove.confirmation.title=Delete ### Missing: relations.remove.confirmation.message=Are you sure you want to delete this relation? ### Missing: relations.remove.confirmation.confirm=Delete
